description: Creates an Amazon Web Services Migration Hub Refactor Spaces environment. The caller owns the environment resource, and all Refactor Spaces applications, services, and routes created within the environment. They are referred to as the environment owner. The environment owner has cross-account visibility and control of Refactor Spaces resources that are added to the environment by other accounts that the environment is shared with. When creating an environment with a CreateEnvironment:NetworkFabricType of TRANSIT_GATEWAY, Refactor Spaces provisions a transit gateway to enable services in VPCs to communicate directly across accounts. If CreateEnvironment:NetworkFabricType is NONE, Refactor Spaces does not create a transit gateway and you must use your network infrastructure to route traffic to services with private URL endpoints.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: NetworkFabricType
parameters.description: The network fabric type of the environment.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags to assign to the environment. A tag is a label that you assign to an Amazon Web Services resource. Each tag consists of a key-value pair. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the environment.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that indicates when the environment is created.

nested_items.name: EnvironmentId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the environment.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that indicates when the environment was last updated.

nested_items.name: NetworkFabricType
nested_items.description: The network fabric type of the environment.

nested_items.name: OwnerAccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of environment owner.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of the environment.
